sentence:
Which sentence is the effect of "The man wanted to get revenge on his enemy."? Choose one between A and B.
A: The man framed his enemy for a crime.
B: The man declared a truce with his enemy.

sentence:

A: He was collecting seashells in the sand.
B: He was building a sand castle.
